SPOTIFY.CANTADDMULTIPLEALBUMS: Can't add multiple albums at once
SPOTIFY.CANTADDMULTIPLEARTISTS: Can't add multiple artists at once
SPOTIFY.CANTADDMULTIPLEPLAYLISTS: Can't add multiple playlists at once
SPOTIFY.CONFIRMCLEARPLAYLIST: Are you sure you want to clear your playlist?
SPOTIFY.CONFIRMOFFLINEPLAYLIST: Would you like to make this playlist available offline?
SPOTIFY.CONFIRMUNAVAILOFFLINEPLAYLIST: This playlist will no longer be available offline. Proceed?
SPOTIFY.TRACKNOTAVAILABLEOFFLINE: Current track is not (or no longer) offline available
SPOTIFY.CONFIRMADDMULTIPLETRACKS: You are about to add {0} tracks.{1} Are you sure?
SPOTIFY.CONFIRMNOWPLAYINGLISTNOTLOADED: You are about to override an unrecovered playlist; previous selected tracks will be lost!
SPOTIFY.OPERATIONTIMEDOUT: Operation timed out, please try again
SPOTIFY.PLAYTOKENLOST: Your account is used somewere else; playbak Paused

SETUP.TITLE: Spotify
SETUP.AUTOLOOP: Auto Loop on end of Playlist
SETUP.SELECTDATAFOLDER: Choose a folder for Spotify data
SETUP.POWERRESUMEDELAY: Delay after resume from sleep mode
